name: King of Deadlands (Early Demo)
description:
Early demo of King of Deadlands game. Mix of falling block puzzle, strategy and roguelite genres. Prototype, in development.
In full version, you will be able to gradually unlock more content and levels.

I will update this demo from time to time, but I am working on it alone, so please understand that it may not be very often.

Please send feedback to kingofdeadlands@gmail.com.
Your opinion matters!

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/KingOfDeadlands
